H0.text: What is the capital of Belize called. Belize City

H1.text: What is the capital of Belize called. Ambergris Caye

H2.text: What is the capital of Belize called. Cayo

H3.text: What is the capital of Belize called. BELMOPAN

A4.text: Belmopan () is the capital city of Belize.

A5.text: Belmopan is the smallest capital city in the continental Americas (by population) and the second-largest settlement in Belize, behind the former capital Belize City.
